# Dhis2WithSormas

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Dhis2WithSormas is to pull data from Dhis2, Sormas and other data sources for the RI/VPDs data triangulation dashboard

## Installation

You can install the development version of Dhis2WithSormas from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("geeks-projects
/Dhis2WithSormas")
```
